links.title: For Better Or Worse, Apple Inc. (AAPL) Isn't Giving Up On Apple Maps
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has arguably the worst major mapping app in the marketplace today. The tech titan totally whiffed with Apple Maps, which it hoped would compete against Google Maps and Waze. Instead, it's become the butt of constant jokes. CEO Tim Cook even apologized for how bad it was.
